welcome.title: Welcome to Cala Blanca Residences
paragraphs: A new development property by AX Partners, consisting of two residential buildings with 29 homes and a commercial space, located in La Plana, one of the quietest and most valued areas of Sitges.
A place designed to enjoy space, natural light and well-being, without giving up luxury.
Most homes are over 100 m², featuring open interiors and spacious terraces with open views of the Mediterranean surroundings.

Each layout has been carefully designed to offer a comfortable, functional and elegant living experience. Homes with 1 to 4 bedrooms, terraces and private gardens, noble materials and high-quality finishes.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Contemporary architecture in harmony with the environment
architecture.description: Two identical buildings with perfectly insulated facades, large windows and overhangs that combine stone and wood, creating a sober and timeless aesthetic. An architecture designed to integrate, not to impose.

passivhaus.title: Passivhaus
passivhaus.subtitle: Living in a passive house
passivhaus.description: Calablanca Residences has been designed under Passivhaus standards, guaranteeing almost zero energy consumption together with high interior comfort.
features: High performance thermal and acoustic insulation
passivhaus.tagline: Living better also means living more efficiently.

location.title: Location
location.subtitle: Sitges · Mediterranean in its purest form
location.description: Just 30 minutes from Barcelona, Sitges is an elegant and sophisticated coastal enclave, surrounded by the Garraf natural park and known for its Mediterranean lifestyle.
